analysis.headline: Your Data Shared for Ads
analysis.quote: Subject to our European Regional Privacy Notice , we may also share with our Affiliates, including Microsoft, your (1) publicly-shared content (such as your public LinkedIn posts) to provide or develop their services and (2) personal data to improve, provide or develop their advertising services.

analysis.headline: Your Profile Data Exported
analysis.quote: Customers can export limited information from your profile, such as name, headline, current company, current title, and general location (e.g., Dublin), such as to manage sales leads or talent, unless you opt-out.

analysis.headline: Your Off-Site Behavior Tracked
analysis.quote: If you are outside the Designated Countries, we also collect (or rely on others, including Microsoft, who collect) information about your device where you have not engaged with our Services (e.g., ad ID, IP address, operating system and browser information) so we can provide our Members with relevant ads and better understand their effectiveness.

analysis.headline: Your Data Powers AI
analysis.quote: We may use your personal data to improve, develop, and provide products and Services, develop and train artificial intelligence (AI) models...

analysis.headline: Your Private Messages Scanned
analysis.quote: If your settings allow, we scan messages to provide “bots” or similar tools that facilitate tasks such as scheduling meetings, drafting responses, summarizing messages or recommending next steps.

analysis.headline: Your Data From Others
analysis.quote: We receive personal data (including contact information) about you when others import or sync their calendar with our Services, associate their contacts with Member profiles, scan and upload business cards, or send messages using our Services (including invites or connection requests).

analysis.headline: Your Employer Sees Usage
analysis.quote: Your employer can review and manage your use of such enterprise Services. Depending on the enterprise Service, before you use such Service, we will ask for permission to share with your employer relevant data from your profile or use of our non-enterprise Services.

analysis.headline: Your Data Lingers Post-Account
analysis.quote: Information you have shared with others (e.g., through InMail, updates or group posts) will remain visible after you close your account or delete the information from your own profile or mailbox, and we do not control data that other Members have copied out of our Services.

analysis.headline: Your Security Not Warranted
analysis.quote: However, we cannot warrant the security of any information that you send us. There is no guarantee that data may not be accessed, disclosed, altered, or destroyed by breach of any of our physical, technical, or managerial safeguards.

analysis.headline: Your Data Crosses Borders
analysis.quote: Countries where we process data may have laws which are different from, and potentially not as protective as, the laws of your own country.
